email_chain.subject: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I hope this message finds you well. We have the MV OCEAN BREEZE available for your coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. Vessel details: DWT 85000, LOA 230m. The freight rate is USD 42/MT CIF. Laycan is 1-5 October. Please confirm if this works for you.

Best regards,
Michael Harris
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high. Can you do USD 38/MT? Also, can you confirm the loading window and demurrage rate?

Best,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thanks for your response. The loading window is 72 hours, and the demurrage rate is USD 10,000/day. The best I can do is USD 40/MT. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

USD 40/MT and USD 10,000 demurrage rate per day are acceptable. Please proceed with the booking.

Best,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE - Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Booking is confirmed. Please find the recap below:
- Commodity: Coal
- Cargo Size: 75000MT
- Load Port: Newcastle
- Discharge Port: Shanghai
- Freight Rate: USD 40/MT CIF
- Laycan: 1-5 October
- Demurrage: USD 10,000/day

Let me know if any corrections are needed.

Best regards,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE - Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Thank you for the confirmation. Looking forward to receiving the final documents.

Best,
Laura
